goal.en: This course is a basic teaching of electric circuits and electronic components. It is designed for the students with mechanical backgrounds in a single semester. It focuses on cultivating students‘ ability to analyze electric circuit problems.
goal.ch: 本課程為電路與電子元件的基礎專業科目，專為機械系設計的單一學期的內容，著重在培養學生分析電子電路問題的能力。

content.en:
1. Circuit variables and elements
2. Simple resistive circuits
3. Techniques of circuit analysis
4. Inductance, capacitance, mutual inductance
5. Semiconductor materials and diodes
6. Diode circuits
7. RL, RC, and RLC circuits
8. Bipolar junction transistors
9. Operational amplifiers
content.ch:
1. 電路變數與電路元件
2. 電阻電路
3. 電路分析技巧
4. 電容、電感與互感
5. 半導體材料與二極體
6. 二極體電路
7. RL、RC與RLC電路
8. 雙極接面電晶體
9. 運算放大器

textbook.en: 1. (Textbook)Electric Circuits 11/e, Global Edition. (by James W. Nilsson , Susan Riedel) 2019. 2. (Supplementary Textbook) Microelectronics: Circuit Analysis and Design 4/e (by Donald A. Neamen) 2010.
textbook.ch: 1. (電路學部分教科書) Electric Circuits 11/e, Global Edition. (by James W. Nilsson , Susan Riedel) 2019. 2. (電子學部分另行補充教材) 可參考Microelectronics: Circuit Analysis and Design 4/e (by Donald A. Neamen) 2010.

grading.en: Class participation and homework: 20％ Midterm Exam #1: 25％ Midterm Exam #2: 25％ Final exam: 30％

flex_desc.en: In the last week, circuit analysis skills will be supplemented according to the teaching progress.
flex_desc.ch: 最後一週將視教學進度補充電路分析技巧。
